description: This vegetable garden sponsored by the block Association received material and technical assistance from TPL and CENYC.  A large pavilion and tool shed occupy the rear of the garden. Bluestone pathways with some old sidewalk slabs were added.  The garden also features a master compost station with a scale to record contributions.  The Green Guerillas helped the gardeners create a mosaic mural.  A rainwater harvesting system catches water from an adjacent building.  A special feature is a memorial dedicated to fallen black firefighters.
name: Cedar Tree Garden
